mapper.update: update app_user set pwd=#{password},upwd=#{password} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select a.*, c.id deptid, c.code, c.name deptname, c.parent_id parentid, c.parent_name parentname, c.* from APP_USER a left join (select t.*, s.userid from v_office t, sys_userrole s where t.id = s.roleid and type between 1 and 3) c on a.userid = c.userid where LOGINNAME=#{username} or a.userid=#{username} and rownum=1
select a.* from SYS_JQRZ_HP a where a.cpuid=#{cpu} and nvl(status,999) not in (1,2)
select a.*,t.deptid,t.oilid from SYS_USERS a,SYS_USER_DEPT t where a.id=t.userid and a.loginid=#{username}
select t.* from sys_userrole a,SYS_ROLE t where userid=#{userid} and a.roleid=t.roleid
select c.permission KEY,c.* from sys_userrole a, sys_office b, sys_menu c, sys_role_menu d where a.roleid = b.id and c.id=d.menu_id and d.role_id=b.id and a.userid=#{userid}
select c.permission KEY,c.* from sys_menu c
